languages.text: {n}Взгляд друкари становится испепеляющим. Кажется, что он сейчас кинется на вас... но в последний момент Маражай бросает взгляд вокруг и удерживается от порыва.{/n} "Молись своим богам, чтобы наши дорожки более никогда не пересеклись, мон-кай".

{n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд друкари становится испепеляющим. Кажется, что он сейчас кинется на вас... но в последний момент Маражай бросает взгляд вокруг и удерживается от порыва.{/n} "Молись своим богам, чтобы наши дорожки более никогда не пересеклись, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your gods that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your gods that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your gods that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mirada del Drukhari se vuelve asesina. Parece estar a punto de lanzarse a por ti... pero en el último momento mira a su alrededor y se contiene.{/n} «Reza a esa carroña a la que sirves para que nuestros caminos no vuelvan a cruzarse, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada del Drukhari se vuelve asesina. Parece estar a punto de lanzarse a por ti... pero en el último momento mira a su alrededor y se contiene.{/n} «Reza a esa carroña a la que sirves para que nuestros caminos no vuelvan a cruzarse, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光变得杀气腾腾。他仿佛要朝你扑来……但到了最后一刻，他环顾四周，住了手。{/n}“向你的尸皇祈祷吧，愿我们的道路再也不会交错，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的目光变得杀气腾腾。他仿佛要朝你扑来……但到了最后一刻，他环顾四周，住了手。{/n}“向你的尸皇祈祷吧，愿我们的道路再也不会交错，猴子。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの視線が殺意を帯びる。まるであなたに攻撃を仕掛けようとしてるかのようだ…だが最後の瞬間、彼は周りを見回して立ち止まった。{/n}「俺たちの道が二度と交わらないよう、神にでも祈るんだな、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの視線が殺意を帯びる。まるであなたに攻撃を仕掛けようとしてるかのようだ…だが最後の瞬間、彼は周りを見回して立ち止まった。{/n}「俺たちの道が二度と交わらないよう、神にでも祈るんだな、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari vous adresse un regard assassin. Il semble prêt à vous sauter à la gorge... mais il se détourne et s'interrompt in extremis.{/n} « Priez la charogne qui vous sert de seigneur et maître pour ne plus jamais recroiser mon chemin, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari vous adresse un regard assassin. Il semble prêt à vous sauter à la gorge... mais il se détourne et s'interrompt in extremis.{/n} « Priez la charogne qui vous sert de seigneur et maître pour ne plus jamais recroiser mon chemin, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Blick des Drukhari wird mörderisch. Er scheint kurz davor zustehen, auf dich loszugehen ... doch im letzten Augenblick sieht er sich um und besinnt sich.{/n} "Betet zu Eurem Aasgott, dass unsere Pfade sich nie wieder kreuzen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blick des Drukhari wird mörderisch. Er scheint kurz davor zustehen, auf dich loszugehen ... doch im letzten Augenblick sieht er sich um und besinnt sich.{/n} "Betet zu Eurem Aasgott, dass unsere Pfade sich nie wieder kreuzen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari sana öldürmek istercesine bakıyor. Üzerine atılmaya hazır gibi... Ancak son anda etrafına bakınıp kendine hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Sen dua et ki bir daha karşılaşmayalım mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's gaze turns murderous. He seems ready to lunge at you... but at the last moment, he looks around and stops himself.{/n} "Pray to your carrion lord that our paths never cross again, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari sana öldürmek istercesine bakıyor. Üzerine atılmaya hazır gibi... Ancak son anda etrafına bakınıp kendine hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Sen dua et ki bir daha karşılaşmayalım mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
